recommended_degree: Ilmu Informatika, Pendidikan Sistem dan Teknologi Informasi, Pendidikan Teknik Informatika & Komputer, Sistem Informasi, Teknologi Informasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Technical Documentation
Writing and preparing technical documentation for applications under development, including API documentation, System Specifications, User Acceptance Tests, and User Manuals. Producing documentation that is easily understood by different audiences, ranging from developers to non-technical users.
2. User Guide
Developing User Guides and Tutorials to assist users in effectively using web and mobile applications.
3. Collaboration with Development Team
Collaborating with the development team and Project Manager to gather information and ensure that documentation aligns with the latest development updates.
4. API Documentation
Crafting well-structured API documentation to facilitate understanding for both external and internal developers on how to use the system.
5. Documentation Updates
Ensuring all documentation is updated in line with system changes and new releases.
6. Application Testing
Participating in application testing (usability testing) to understand how users interact with the product and integrating those insights into the documentation.
